name: SwapBox+
description:
Description

Played SwapBox? Want more? Good news, it's being fleshed out into a full game, and you can play the demo here!

Controls

Use WASD to move, space to jump, mouse to look, and left-click to swap with boxes.

Credits

Level Design, Game Design and programming by Nathan Powless-Lynes

Art and visual effects by Matthew Murchison

Sound Design and narrative by Nicklas Steffensen
